transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha, hello. Hello. Mam, mai Tannu baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Yes, mam.
Executive: Ha, vo aap se baat ho rahi thi na, to usi ke liye mujhe connect karna tha. Sir ne bola tha ki aapko direct connect karungi, discuss karne ke liye. To mam, mai ye bol rahi thi, jo aapka number to maine add kara hi liya hai aur abhi aapke paas jaise koi bhi buyer call karega, to vo call abhi aapke paas directly aane start ho jayenge. And mam, mujhe ek cheez aur batani thi, mai chah rahi thi ki aapka na profile me number add karana aur mai kara deti, jaise ki aapka directly koi call laga pau. To ek baar aap further icon pe click karenge mam?
Customer: Ha, kar diya.
Executive: Thik hai. Further icon pe click karne ke baad aap check karna mam, vaha par aapko na ek option aa raha hoga. Mai batati hu, additionally detail karke profile pe aa raha hoga aapka. Profile pe click karo.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Profile pe click karne ke baad dekho additionally details kahi pe aa raha hai?
Customer: Additional details to nahi aa raha hai, matlab kaha pe aayega?
Executive: Mam, aap mobile pe check kar rahi ho na ya fir system pe kar rahi ho?
Customer: Ha, mobile pe.
Executive: Mam, system hai kya aapke paas available?
Customer: Abhi nahi hai.
Executive: Abhi nahi hai. Koi problem nahi. Ek minute ruk ja, mai dekh leti hu.
Executive: Aap mujhe ek baar screenshot share kar sakte ho kya? Mai aapko hi kar rahi hu message se. Ek baar mujhe screenshot bhejenge ki kya option dikh rahe hai, to mai guide kar pau aapko aage ka.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. Yaha par dekhiye kahi pe bhi ye aa raha hai contact number add karne ka option ya koi bhi option aa raha hai? Additional contact information karke likha hai kahi par?
Customer: Abhi tak mera number add nahi hua na?
Executive: Mam, add to maine isme add kar diya, vo buyers ka bolte hai, niche aapka detail bhi add kar dungi, jisse mai bhi aapke number pe call kar pau. Isliye puch bol rahi thi. To aap additional contact information me add kar lijiye apna number.
Customer: Isme nahi hai, but agar mai profile pe jati hu aur ye jaise ki primary information, other information hai. Jaise primary me Faisal ka number hai aur other me Ankit ka number hai.
Executive: Okay. Vaha par kahi pe additionally contact add karne ka kuch aa raha hai? Additionally contact information ya aisa kuch?
Customer: Nahi. Profile pe jo icon hai us pe nahi aa raha. Maine aapko screenshot bheja hai, check karna.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai, to mujhe lagta hai mujhe system pe connect karana padega fir aapko ek baar. Are koi problem nahi mam, aap system pe ek baar possible ho payega. Ki aapko mujhe jyada nahi, one time use ke liye chahiye. Aap ek baar aa jayiyega. To kab possible ho payega system pe connect hona?
Customer: System pe aap site pe karvaoge kya?
Executive: Sirf number add karana hai aapka, additionally contact number me.
Customer: To aap system pe site pe karvaoge na?
Executive: Sorry, pardon.
Customer: Website.
Executive: Ha, website pe, yes mam.
Customer: Kal, kal morning me. Mai aapko message kar dungi.
Executive: Thik hai. Aap jab bhi open matlab ho paye na, possible ho paye, mere ko batana, mai aapka sirf additionally contact number me add kara dungi, jisse mai connect kar paungi aapko. Thik hai. Okay.
Customer: Okay. Okay mam. Okay, thank you. Thank you mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add another contact number.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to guide on call.

- Asked to connect via system to add number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will message executive tomorrow morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- contact number, profile, website
